attributes.action: To reduce the age on 50cc motorbikes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is trying to lower the age of 50cc mtorbikes, these bikes are not too powerful for 14 year olds so i want to lower it so i can ride it being 13 myself next year i want to be able to ride one. 16 years of age is too high for a bike so weak. Also it would be easier for me and others like me to get to and from school every morning. Spain have lowered the age so why can't we!
